result.markdown: --- title: "Shuai Wang" subtitle: "Geospatial Data Analytics & City Planning" format: html --- ::: {.cell .column-screen layout-align="center"} ::: ## Education #### **University of Pennsylvania**, *Philadelphia, PA (Aug 2023 -- Present)* **Master of City Planning in Spatial Analytics** - Relevant courses: Geospatial Cloud Computing (SQL), Machine Learning in Remote Sensing (Python), Public Policy Analytics (R), Quantitative Analysis Methods (R) #### **University of Liverpool**, *Liverpool, UK* **Bachelor of Arts in Urban Planning** - Relevant courses: Geospatial Data Science (Python), Urban & Environmental Economics ## Professional Experience #### **Transport Planning and GIS Intern**, *Liverpool, UK (Jun - Sep 2022)* **Mott Macdonald** #### **Urban Planning and Design Intern**, *Suzhou, China (Jul - Aug 2021)* **Suzhou Planning & Design Research Institute** ## Research Experience #### **Geospatial Research Assistant**, *Philadelphia, PA (Dec 2023 - Present)* **Business and Conflict Barometer Initiative, The Wharton School** #### **Undergraduate Transport Researcher**, *Liverpool, UK (Apr 2022 - Jun 2023)* **School of Environmental Science, University of Liverpool** #### **Undergraduate Researcher**, *Suzhou, China (Jun - Sep 2021)* **Department of Urban Planning, Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University** ## Extracurricular Experience #### **Content Planning Board Member**, *Philadelphia, PA (Sep 2023 - Present)* **Wharton Future of Cities Conference** ## Skills & Hobbies - Technical skills: R (dplyr, tidyverse, etc.) | Python (pandas, numpy, etc.) | ArcGIS Pro, QGIS | Microsoft Excel | Adobe Illustrator & Photoshop - Interests: Amateur baker, world traveling, exploring parks, hiking, photography in new cities
